gif.st September 2011

View Source Code

Gif.st was a project for Peter Wooley’s advanced scripting class in the Summer of 2011. I used the concept of a simple gif sharing service to experiment with handling file uploads, third-party authentication through twitter, AJAX and HTML5 pushState. The back end was built using Ruby, Sinatra, PostgreSQL, and Amazon’s S3 cloud storage service, and the application was hosted on Heroku. The application also featured a URL shortening service.
